Ragnar: I think I found a way for us to go back to Strana Mechty. I
want you to help me take it. Can you do that?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Jackie might have tech skills, but he can also be a smart-aleck: "Yes 
> SIR!  Happy to help, SIR!  Three bags full, SIR!"  He deliberately 
> salutes hard enough to cause a resounding metallic clang as his hand 
> strikes his forehead - and he doesn't even salute properly.  His 
> display over, he follows Ragnar.  "So, what's up?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Ragnar sees Wheeljack. Knowing the bot has tech skills, he reaches 
> him
> > with a hand.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Wheeljack, you're coming with me.
> > 
> > Katya: These are your manners? A Star Commander should watch his
> > contractions.
> > 
> > The big guy sighed.
> > 
> > Ragnar: Didn't Natasha Kerensky say "Slavish adherence to formal
> > rituals shows that one has nothing better to think about"? I want to
> > go back to my Clan. And I am certain the disappearance of a Khan 
> and a
> > Loremaster will have some effect. I think I know how, so don't stop 
> me.
> > 
> > Katya lowered her head.
> > 
> > Katya: You are right... What do I do?
> > 
> > Blackfang: How about we get that Vlad?
> > 
> > Katya: Yes... But where is he? He was not at the battle.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Then let's ask Kup. He knows anything you want.
> > 
> > Blackfang and Katya left the room and went looking for Kup.
